fields_of_interest: Budget, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Transport, Communication
inter_groups:
Disability Intergroup European Parliament 
EU Parliament Interest Group on Rheumatic and Musculoskeletal Diseases
eu_initiatives:
All actions on Chronic Disease and Healthy Ageing (such as CHRODIS, EIP AHA) and related public consultations such as Primary Care definition,  
Joint Programming (Alzheimer's) 
Driving Licence Directive 
Legislation on substances of human origin (blood, tissues, cells and organs);
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
World Glaucoma Association (WGA), a global Glaucoma Network; http://www.worldglaucoma.org/ 
 
European Alliance for Vision Research and Ophthalmology (EU-EYE), a network of ophthalmological societies  
 
European Coalition for Vision (ECV), an alliance of professional bodies, patient groups, European NGOs, disabled people's organisations and trade associations; http://www.ecvision.eu/
relevant_communication: Consultations and hearings of the Expert Panel on Investment in Health on Innovative Payment models; benchmarking access to healthcare; competition of healthcare providers; methodologies in assessing performance of primary care;
goals__remit:
To establish a network of glaucoma specialists in Europe  
 
To enhance knowledge exchange amongst glaucoma specialists and disseminate specific knowledge to the general ophthalmologists in Europe 
 
To stimulate, compare and register glaucoma research in Europe 
 
To liaise with similar glaucoma groups across the world
